item.title: eclipse - Improving the Java development workflow - Programmers ...
item.description: Each developer decides on their tool of choice (somewhat a good thing) and due to the lack of any kind of procedure in terms of 3rd party dependency management, we more often than not run into build or deployment problems and hit serious setbacks when developer machines have to be rebuilt for one reason or another. Our Java ... Visual Studio helps here too with its version check but this process is working well and I feel it could be replicated for our Java development efforts.
